attributes.action: Scrap  show of proof that you have had the covid vaccination.
attributes.additional_details: The government is taking away out humans rights. There’s many people out there that cannot go through with the vaccine for several health reason but the government does not take this into consideration. We have human rights to accept the vaccine or not and this as gone to far now.
attributes.background: I want the government to scrap proof that someone as been vaccinated against covid 19

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about being required to provide proof of vaccination against covid-19, however it's not clear what it is you want people to be able to do without being required to prove their vaccination status. 

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

'Do not require a Covid passport for access to any services, jobs or events': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593122

'Do not mandate a vaccine passport for international travel to or from the UK.': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581401

'No vaccine passport to attend English football matches and other sporting venues': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593341
